en.av_Authors: Cliff Shaffer and Mauricio De La Barra
en.av_arrValsPlaceholder: Type some array values, or click 'run' to use random values
en.av_c3: For each pass, we will move left to right looking for the next smallest value. Once that is found, it will be swapped into its final position (these will be shown in lighter color).
en.av_c6: For each element moving through the list: the smallest seen so far is always red.
en.av_c7: Compare to smallest seen so far.
en.av_c8: Found something smaller, so switch value of minIndex.
en.av_c9: Now swap the next smallest element into place.
